explains: adj. 轻盈的（等于 lithesome）；柔软的；易弯曲的

sentences.en: His walk was lithe and graceful.
Just an impression of graceful, lithe forms. Then nothing.
sentences.cn: 印象中除了优美、轻盈外，别无其他。

sentences.en: Seamlessly, the dancers move from breakdance to something more lithe.
sentences.cn: 舞者从霹雳舞向一些更加柔和的舞过度的天衣无缝，十分完美。
